titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for the restoration of an annuity portion for those with ten years or more of railroad service before January 1, 1975.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 9/15/1987--Introduced. Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to restore an annuity portion for employees with ten or more years of railroad service before January 1, 1975.
